name: Independent Living Bullion
description: Silver, Gold, and Other Precious Metals
overview:
Independent Living Bullion sells various precious metals to investors who are wishing to secure their investments and assets from financial turmoil. Independent Living Bullion is headquartered in Eagle, Idaho, and abides by a strict corporate philosophy that allows clients to receive the most precious metals, whether gold, silver, platinum, or palladium, for the amount of money they pay.

The company does not sell rare and collectible coins and discourages it clients from buying these types of coins due to the sheer volatility of that particular market. Furthermore, Independent Living Bullion’s various precious-metals experts have published numerous articles documenting the poor returns investors receive on so-called “collectible” coins. That said, the company sells all of its precious metals as bullion rounds and bars, as well as minted coins made in the United States and Canada, while giving its clients the option to choose the amount they want to invest.

By giving its clients this option, the company allows clients to consider current trends in the market performance of a precious metal, whether it’s gold or silver, and thus invest appropriately. Investors can learn how to buy precious metals by visiting www.independentlivingbullion.com.
